text:
hey there! 

although it sounds simple, making sustainable choices may call for a little push. 

this is what I'll be working on for the next 6 weeks, an app that gamifies sustainability.

I'd appreciate feedback! 

cc: @_nightsweekends @_buildspace 

p.s.  working on the name xd https://t.co/cii4KjnfBe
